gameDetails.name: Alien Frontiers: Faction Pack #4
gameDetails.description:
Alien Frontiers: Faction Pack #4 - Prophets of the Artifact

Strange emanations from the Alien Artifact have given this group of technologies the power to influence the destinies of others.

FACTION ABILITIES

     OWNER:  Discard a face-down Agenda card to get 3 fuel or 1 ore or 1 Agenda Card.
     FACILITY:  Draw Agenda Cards equal to the value of your docked ship. Keep one and return the rest to the bottom of the Agenda deck.


COMPONENTS

     Faction Board
     1 new Alien Tech Card
     2 new Agenda Cards
